results.name: Coefficients in expansion of (1-x)^floor(n/2)(1+x)^ceiling(n/2).
comment: Triangle T(n,k), 0<=k<=n, read by rows given by: [1,0,-1,0,0,0,0,0,...]DELTA[1,-2,1,0,0,0,0,0,...] where DELTA is the operator defined in A084938. - _Philippe Deléham_, Sep 22 2008
The production matrix for this array has bivariate e.g.f. equal to exp(-t*x)*(1-t). - _Paul Barry_, Nov 22 2008
The elements of the matrix inverse are apparently T^(-1)(n,k) = (-1)^(n+k)*T(n,k). - _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 08 2013
Row sums give A130706. - _Philippe Deléham_, Oct 21 2013
link: E. Burlachenko, Fractal generalized Pascal matrices, arXiv:1612.00970 [math.NT], 2016. See p. 3.
mathematica: t[n_, k_] := Coefficient[(1-x)^Floor[n/2]*(1+x)^Ceiling[n/2], x, k]; Table[t[n, k], {n, 0, 12}, {k, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 09 2014 *)
